backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling site settings, user profiles, and public inquiry submissions with admin-controlled access via AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a logo replacement requirement and its associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of various frontend files and their roles in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, Open Graph tags, fonts, and bootstrapping for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for landing, inquiries, and settings pages and includes a global toaster.
frontend/src/components/meraki/LoginButt: Internet Identity login/logout button that handles auth state, errors, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/meraki/ProfileSe: Dialog for firstâ€‘time admin profile setup allowing name entry and saving via backend mutation.
frontend/src/features/booking/ContactBoo: Validated contact and inquiry form supporting service selection, consent, and backend submission with success handling.
frontend/src/features/landing/AboutSecti: Renders an About section with descriptive text about Rishab Mehta and highlight cards showcasing key achievements and qualities.
frontend/src/features/landing/FaqSection: Displays a FAQ section using an accordion to present common questions and detailed answers about offered services.
frontend/src/features/landing/Footer.tsx: Provides a footer with branding, navigation links, service shortcuts, and social media icons, including smooth-scroll behavior.
Implements a responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/features/landing/HeroSectio: Renders the hero banner with background imagery, headline, CTAs, and key statistics, including smooth-scroll actions.
frontend/src/features/landing/HowItWorks: Shows a four-step process using card components to explain how consultations and guidance services operate.
frontend/src/features/landing/ServiceDet: Renders detailed service cards with descriptions and expectations, and scrolls to the contact section with a service parameter in the URL.
frontend/src/features/landing/ServicesSe: Displays a grid of service preview cards and scrolls to detailed service sections when selected.
frontend/src/features/landing/Testimonia: Shows static client testimonials with ratings and styled presentation cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls for inquiries, profiles, admin checks, and site settings using React Query and the actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for a purple-gold design with light/dark modes and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/merakiServices.ts: Defines Meraki service types and a registry of service metadata mapped to backend service values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Displays and filters user inquiries with authentication checks and admin-only access handling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the landing page by assembling multiple marketing and booking sections.
frontend/src/pages/SiteSettingsPage.tsx: Admin-only page for viewing and updating site contact and business settings with validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project version, branding notes, known issues, image requirements, and a list of implemented website features for Meraki's marketing site.
